about_description: A Python-based tool for detecting plagiarism in Zotero reference libraries
author: Author
checksum_mismatch: The checksum of the downloaded file does not match. The file may be corrupted.
database_updated: The database has been updated from version {old} to version {new}.
documents_found: {to_compare} documents found to compare and {to_index} documents to index.
download_completed: Download completed. Do you want to install the update now?
error_converting_document: Unable to convert target document to PDF.
error_documents_not_found: No PDFs found in the selected folder
error_file_not_existing: The specified file does not exist
error_folder_not_existing: The specified folder does not exist!
error_format_document: The target document format must be docx or pdf.
error_loading_incremental_database: Unable to load the indexed files database. The file may be corrupted or open in another application.
error_no_documents_found_in_zotero_colle: No PDFs found in the Zotero collection.
error_reading_documents_zotero: Unable to read PDFs from Zotero. Zotero may already be open. Try closing it
error_reading_zotero_collections:
Unable to read collections from Zotero.
Zotero may already be open. Try closing it.
error_saving_database: Unable to save the index in the database.
error_unhandled_exception:
An unexpected error occurred.
A log file has been generated
info_change_language: Changing the language will take effect on the next application startup.
no_database_found_index_rebuilded: No database found: a new index will be created.
no_more_similar_sentences: There are no sentences with similarity equal to or greater than {more_similar_ngram}.
path_db_zotero_not_found:
Zotero database path not found.
The path will need to be searched manually
question_rebuilding_database:
Do you really want to rebuild the n-gram database?
If you answer Yes, this operation will delete the existing database and may take time.
question_run_analysis:
Do you want to proceed with similarity analysis?
If you answer Yes, a new database will be built.
rebuild_database_ngrams: Rebuild the n-gram database before analysis
select_folder_database_ngrams: Select a folder for the n-gram DB
stopped_analysis: Analysis stopped before the next document.
tooltip_exclude_sections:
Include section titles that should be excluded from indexing.
Separate titles with a ; character
tooltip_incremental_database:
This option allows you to load all saved n-gram databases
with the active options (number of n-grams, excluded sections and quoted sentences).
Only n-grams from new documents that are not in the databases are saved.
tooltip_open_save_database_ngrams:
The n-grams of compared files will be saved
in a local database to speed up future analyses.
update_available:
Version {latest} is available.
Do you want to update?
warning_change_ngram_db_folder: Changing the n-gram database folder will result in loss of the existing index.
